subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Thompson sustained an Achilles’ tendon injury during a preseason game against the Bengals. Another safety, Landon Collins, will miss at least a week with a sprained knee that he sustained in the same game.
snippet: Thompson sustained an Achilles’ tendon injury during a preseason game against the Bengals. Another safety, Landon Collins, will miss at least a week with a sprained knee that he sustained in the same game.
